Key Match Events: Shubman Gill hit a six off Alzarri Joseph.
Suryakumar Yadav was run out by Kyle Mayers.
Ishan Kishan hit a six off Akeal Hosein.
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies captain Rovman Powell mentioned they did not lose wickets in cluster and bowled as a unit.
India captain Hardik Pandya said they will bat first as the wicket looks nice and they want to put runs on the board.
India has a forced change with Kuldeep Yadav injured, replaced by Ravi Bishnoi.
